alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 2:59PM MDT until April 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first High Wind Warning, northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph ongoing. For the second High Wind Warning, northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Briggsdale, Fort Morgan, Limon, Sterling, Akron, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Warning, until 9 PM MDT this evening. For the second High Wind Warning, from 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Wednesday. Winds will lull slightly overnight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Strong winds will likely lead to rapid fire growth of any new fires. Blowing dust will reduce visibility to less than a quarter mile in places.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Avoid outdoor burning or any activity that may cause sparks. The strong winds will likely fuel rapid fire growth.
